title: [1.14.4]游戏崩溃
author: 有毒○贰比
txt_content:
如题（当然是我朋友的电脑）
崩溃报告

 [16:52:27] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: qmzhn
[16:52:38] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 3.2.2 build 10
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I feel sad now :(

Time: 19-8-27 下午4:52
Description: Initializing game

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
WGL: The driver does not appear to support OpenGL
更新显卡驱动。
